short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Uses the chrome.debugger API to help catan game player to track the card distribution.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Uses the chrome.debugger API to help Catan game player to track the card distribution.

In the latest build, we introduced below 2 features:
1. Auto Reject Trade
2. Auto Control

Usage:
When you are in the Catan game page, click the extension and it will start monitor the game status. And the latest status will be displayed on the top of the game page.
